just google google chrome: bad idea to "just google" stuff instead of getting it from the repositories...

the thing is, the policy in this channel is to prefer things that are in the repositories over third-party builds. especially so over builds that aren't in the form of .deb files, but even when they are - as is the case with Chrome - getting them from the repos gives stronger guarantees that they will keep working on system updates, and won't interfer with other packages
